item.title: Flask-Appbuilder new REST API, and Superset MVC to SPA revamp
item.description:
Description

Quick presentation around Flask-AppBuilder new REST API - Automatic and configurable OpenAPI specs - Apache Superset MVC to SPA revamp (challenges, direction) - Security, monitoring metrics (statsd, datadog) Edit from ARJ: FlaskAppBuilder is the project Apache Airflow was built on
item.dc:creator: Daniel Gaspar
